- Thank you to all the faculty, transitioning to on-line was monumental, thank you for the work you did so I could continue learning

- Thank you to the counselors, your support got me

- Thankful for the city of Butte and the people of Butte for the environment they provided for me over the last two years and place for me to call home.

Montana Technological University
November 7, 2019 at 3:01 PM ·

Our campus is deeply saddened with the passing of a great Oredigger, John “Jocko” Evans ‘65. Jocko had enjoyed a long career in industry before returning to Tech first as a faculty member and later becoming department head of Petroleum Engineering. During his time at Tech, Jocko taught and mentored hundreds of students, launching them on the pathway to their own extraordinary futures. Jocko received Montana Tech’s highest honor, the Chancellor’s Medallion, at the university’s commencement ceremony in 2016. Our Oredigger family sends our thoughts and prayers to Gaye and all of his family.
